item.description:
Who doesn't love Nada Surf?! And as a BONUS for the older folks in the group, this is a FRIDAY night show. :)

Doors are at 8:00PM and the show starts at 9:00PM. Tickets are on sale now and I imagine this will sell out. Advance Box Office Price is $22.50; I paid $30.50 through Ticketmaster.

Let's meet at 8:00PM at T's Pub for introductions and a beverage before heading over to the show. T's is located at 973 Comm Ave, right next door to The Paradise. I will send an email a day or so before the show to reconfirm and provide my cell number to attendees.

I hope to see you there!
item.name: Nada Surf @ The Paradise 4/6/12
